quote: He who is not contented with what he has, would not be contented with what he would like to have. – Socrates
fact: To Ensure Promptness, one is expected to pay beyond the value of service – hence the later abbreviation: T.I.P.
joke: It was so cold yesterday my computer froze. My own fault though, I left too many windows open.
